DOC.brief_summary: Women with polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) are often insulin resistant. During pregnancy, insulin sensitivity decreases. The investigators examine glucose metabolism during oral glucose tolerance test and the incidense of gestational diabetes mellitus in a prospective cohort of pregnant women with PCOS and controls.
DOC.brief_title: Screening for GDM in Women With PCOS and Controls
DOC.criteria: Pregnancy achieved during 20102012 Residents of the municipality of Odense Moving from Odense during pregnancy
